meta.title: ECGC PO Computer Knowledge - Set 14 (PYQ Special)

questions.question: Which of the following is a non-volatile memory that retains data even when power is off?
In MS PowerPoint, which view is best used to reorder slides?
A network security system that monitors and controls incoming and outgoing network traffic is called a:
Which protocol is used for browsing websites securely?
The smallest unit of a digital image is called a:
Which key combination is used to permanently delete a file/folder?
Who is considered the 'Father of the Computer'?
Which of the following is an example of an Operating System?
The process of starting a computer from a powered-off state is called:
Which output device is used to produce large-format drawings like architectural blueprints?
In a database, a 'Tuple' refers to a:
What does 'URL' stand for?
Which malware disguises itself as legitimate software?
1 Byte equals how many bits?
Which shortcut in MS Excel is used to insert the current date?
Which topology connects all devices to a single central cable?
Software that translates source code into object code all at once is called a:
Which of the following is NOT a web browser?
The 'Brain' of the computer where calculations take place is the:
Which port number is standard for SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol)?
